content.data:
[Y]Scroller Style
[W]Movement, rhythm and cheeky text.
[c][m.]
[W]Scrollers work best with short sharp
[W]lines and deliberate pacing.
[W]Synchronising text rhythm with music
[W]accents adds energy.
[c][m.]
[G]- Keep lines short.
[G]- Use clear spacing.
[G]- Loop gracefully.
[m][m-]
[Y]SCENE STYLE
[C]A tiny joke can carry a long scroller.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
